alert.note: Alert for Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:47PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Navarro County through 415 PM CDT... At 347 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Angus, or near Corsicana, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corsicana, Angus, Navarro, Lake Halbert, Richland-Chambers Reservoir, Retreat, Oak Valley, Mildred, Eureka, Richland, Mustang, Corbet and Purdon. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 214 and 229. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
